潠字的基本解释

潠
xùn
同“噀”。

潠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sùn］
［《廣韻》蘇困切，去慁，心。］
喷。

潠字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　潠； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页649第17
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?蘇困切，音巽。【說文】含水噴也。【後漢·郭憲傳】含酒三噀。　又【集韻】須絹切，音選。與?同。亦噴也。　別作?噀。【六書故】潠，刷洗也。一作?。

潠字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
潠字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Shi
xùn
Same as "puff".
Shi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sùn］
["Guangyun" Su sleepy and cut, go sullen, heart. ]
spray.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　潠; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 649 17
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Su Kunqie, sound Xun. [Said the text] Water spray also. [Later Han·Guo Xian Biography] Three fathoms with wine.　 [Ji Yun] Shou silk cut, phonetic selection. Same as? Also spray too.　Don't make it? Puff. [Six Books] 潠, also scrubbing. One for?.
